dcterms:description: 20,000 items/documents and corresponding details (titles, url, description) were provided to humans for extracting the summaries. The task was to extract and rank the sentences from the descriptions given eBay item url. 5k items out of 20k items were used for evaluations (Golden Set) and 15,000 items were used for training different models.
dcterms:title: Human Extracted Snippets

dcterms:description: Sentences from 100,000 item-descriptions were extracted and ranked based on relevance towards the document context. Several techniques have been proposed based on query, thematic similarity, topic signature and Latent Semantic Analysis.
dcterms:title: Semi-supervised Large Scale Summarization Approximation
